S

saveGame(File) - Method in class Controllers.MineSweeperController
Saves the game by outputting the current state of the board and the instance variables to a file.
saveTime() - Method in class Models.ScoreBoard
This saves the times stored in the scoreboard into a text file We call this when the user generates a new top time that we want to save
SCENE_HEIGHT - Static variable in class View.MineSweeper
 
SCENE_WIDTH - Static variable in class View.MineSweeper
 
scoreBoard - Variable in class Controllers.MineSweeperController
 
ScoreBoard - Class in Models
This class stores a scoreboard for Minesweeper, which tracks the best times for each difficulty.
ScoreBoard() - Constructor for class Models.ScoreBoard
Loads a scoreboard from the file if applicable, allocating NUM_TOP_TIMES slots to each difficulty.
SCREEN_HEIGHT - Static variable in class View.MineSweeper
 
SCREEN_WIDTH - Static variable in class View.MineSweeper
 
setBoard(MineSweeperTile[][]) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperBoard
Sets the board to an existing board, from a loaded file.
setBoardDimensions(String) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperBoard
This takes in a difficulty and changes the board dimensions to match that
setBoardDisabled(boolean) - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Sets every hexagon and label to be disabled or enabled, true being disabled
setBoardOpacity(double) - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Sets every hexagon's opacity to the value given in the arguments
setBomb() - Method in class Models.MineSweeperTile
Mark that this tile contains a mine.
setButtonActions(Button, Button, Button) - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Sets the functionality of the save, load, and reset buttons on the screen.
setDifficulty(String) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperBoard
Sets the *written* difficulty of the board, not the actual in-game difficulty! This method is called when loading from a saved file, to ensure that we save to the correct scoreboard slot, rather than that of the game we overwrote.
setNumBombs(int) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperBoard
Sets the *displayed* and *calculated* number of bombs on the board, not the actual number of tiles with bombs on them! This method is called when loading from a saved file, to ensure that we keep using the saved target number of bombs to end the game, rather than the overwritten target number.
setObserver(Observer) - Method in class Controllers.MineSweeperController
Adds an observer to the model's observer list.
setObserver(Observer) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperBoard
Adds an observer to notify of changes.
setSecondsElapsed(int) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperBoard
Updates the number of milliseconds elapsed to match an input in seconds.
setStatus(GUESS_STATUS) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperTile
 
showAllBombs() - Method in class Controllers.MineSweeperController
Shows all bombs by iterating through the board.
shutdown() - Method in class Models.MineSweeperBoard
This terminates the executor so it is not running after the game is over
shutdownTimer() - Method in class Controllers.MineSweeperController
This kills the timer executor so that it is no longer running.
SIX_MINE - Static variable in class View.MineSweeper
 
stage - Variable in class View.MineSweeper
 
start(Stage) - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Runs upon launch.
status - Variable in class Models.MineSweeperTile
